rooms.title: Silent Market
rooms.description: Stalls stand ready for traders that never quite arrive. Awning cords sway in the breeze, playing soft chords that echo across the plaza. Chalk markings on the stones update themselves with the day's recommended bargains.

items.name: Sealed Trade Ledger
items.description: Wax sigils glow faintly, promising fortunes to whoever breaks the seal.

items.name: String of Chimes
items.description: Each bell rings a different currency when shaken.

items.name: Merchant's Beacon
items.description: Set it beside a stall and it projects a hologram advertising your wares.

npcs.name: Broker Nal
npcs.auto_greet: Prices are low, stakes are highâ€”care to barter with ghosts of buyers yet to come?

rooms.title: Prism Gate
rooms.description: A crystalline arch captures light from the Glassway, refracting it into ribbons that label each stall with floating sigils. Couriers pause here to exchange sealed route markers before diving back into the city's traffic.

items.name: Route Marker
items.description: Snap the marker in half to share a temporary shortcut with an ally.

rooms.title: Auric Arcade
rooms.description: A covered walkway glittering with gilded mosaics showcases artisans specializing in jewelry and rare metals. Mirrors angle sunlight to spotlight each display even on cloudy days.

items.name: Gemscope
items.description: Peer through it to see the ethical history of any gem you inspect.

rooms.title: Ledger Gallery
rooms.description: Suspended ledgers rotate slowly, offering transparent pages that reveal trade histories at a touch. Whispered deals flutter through the air like pages turned by invisible fingers.

items.name: Balance Abacus
items.description: Sliding the beads forecasts profit margins for any proposed trade.

rooms.title: Merchant Guildhall
rooms.description: Grand banners hang from vaulted ceilings, each representing a guild sworn to uphold fair trade. Negotiation tables ringed with comfortable chairs await delegates seeking compromise.

items.name: Guild Seal
items.description: A seal that temporarily grants you the backing of the guildhall during negotiations.

npcs.name: Guildmaster Pahr
npcs.auto_greet: Speak plainly, bargain fairly, and the guild will ensure your ledger ends in black.

rooms.title: Tinker Lane
rooms.description: Cobblestones vibrate with the purr of clockwork toys weaving between stalls. Portable workbenches line the lane, offering repairs while you wait.

items.name: Clockwork Charm
items.description: Attach it to any device and it gains a polite personality for a day.

rooms.title: Saffron Colonnade
rooms.description: Columns wrapped in fragrant spice garlands color the air with shades of amber and crimson. Lanterns shaped like pepper pods blink encouragingly at hesitant buyers.

items.name: Spice Sampler
items.description: A tray of powders that, when sprinkled, recreates the scent of distant markets.

rooms.title: Harbor Market
rooms.description: Covered stalls serve sailors and skyfarers, trading salted delicacies and glowing kelp. Tide bells ring softly to announce incoming shipments.

items.name: Cargo Scrip
items.description: Redeemable for transport of a single crate on the next tide-runner.

rooms.title: Salt Exchange
rooms.description: Vaulted alcoves store rare salts that shimmer in hues from violet to jade. Traders test samples on carved tasting stones that flash when the mineral suits their needs.

items.name: Prism Salt
items.description: A pinch seasons food and briefly lets the diner breathe underwater.

rooms.title: Clocktower Plaza
rooms.description: Bronze numerals circle overhead, raining punctuality on anyone who lingers too long. A gentle ticking pulses through the plaza, syncing with every heartbeat nearby.

items.name: Minute Hammer
items.description: Tap a surface to reset the local timepiece network by a single minute.

rooms.title: Clocktower Belfry
rooms.description: Giant chimes hang silent between beats, storing up the next note like a held breath. Swirling glyphs chart the winds, guiding messages between the tower and the observatory.

items.name: Echo Mallet
items.description: Strike a bell and its tone repeats every hour until silenced.

rooms.title: Parade Concourse
rooms.description: Banners ripple despite the still air, rehearsing applause for the next celebration. Painted footprints on the stones teach dancers new steps overnight.

items.name: Festival Baton
items.description: Wave it and the banners coordinate in dazzling synchronized patterns.

rooms.title: Festival Stage
rooms.description: A polished wooden stage awaits performers, enchanted spotlights following whoever dares step up. Backstage curtains hide dressing rooms sized for both giants and sprites.

items.name: Encore Mask
items.description: Wearing the mask ensures the crowd demands an encore after any performance.

rooms.title: Lantern Row
rooms.description: Paper lanterns float at shoulder height, escorting wanderers between market and garden paths. Each lantern hums a different lullaby learned from the garden's night blossoms.

items.name: Guiding Lantern
items.description: It remembers the last safe route you walked and can replay the journey as a light-trail.

rooms.title: Whispering Alley
rooms.description: Shuttered stalls gossip quietly, trading secrets as casually as coins. The cobbles are etched with coded symbols for smugglers who still owe favors to the market.

items.name: Secret Ledger
items.description: Flip to any page and it reveals the last clandestine trade recorded there.

rooms.title: Harbor of Gentle Tides
rooms.description: Bioluminescent currents lap at rune-carved docks where tide charts hum reassuring lullabies. Mooring lines tie themselves in tidy knots whenever a ship arrives.

items.name: Tide Compass
items.description: The compass needle points toward the next incoming vessel.

npcs.name: Harbormaster Siel
npcs.auto_greet: Keep your paperwork dry and your promises drier.

rooms.title: Harbor Lighthouse
rooms.description: A spiral beacon spins quiet halos, guiding both ships and errant daydreams back to shore. Shelves of polished lenses rest against the wall, ready to swap in for different weather.

items.name: Beacon Lens
items.description: Slot it into the lighthouse lamp to send customized light signals across the bay.

rooms.title: Vaulted Storage
rooms.description: Crates levitate just above the floor, labeled in tidy handwriting that rearranges itself. Weightless lifts glide up and down between mezzanines stacked with carefully cataloged goods.

items.name: Inventory Ledger
items.description: Consult it to know exactly where any stored crate currently floats.

rooms.title: Shadow Vault
rooms.description: Cool darkness keeps rare curios safe; shadows queue patiently to be borrowed for disguises. A whisper of silk hints at unseen attendants managing the secrecy of every deposit.

items.name: Veil Token
items.description: Hold it and nearby shadows twine around you like a cloak.

npcs.name: Shadow Curator Illin
npcs.auto_greet: Your secrets are safe so long as you remember where you left them.
